property.name: aboutText
property.value:
CORE-V™-SDK v0.0.0.3 05-Aug-2022
Developed by Ashling (https://www.ashling.com/ ), Embecosm (https://www.embecosm.com/ ) and the OpenHW™ group (https://www.openhwgroup.org/ ) including contributions from ArSysOp and others...
CORE-V™-SDK would not be possible without the following fantastic open-source software. Hat tip to all: - Embecosm CORE-V GCC Toolchain : https://www.embecosm.com/resources/tool-chain-downloads/#corev - Eclipse including Eclipse CDT: https://www.eclipse.org/eclipse and https://projects.eclipse.org/projects/tools.cdt - Eclipse Embedded CDT: https://eclipse-embed-cdt.github.io/ - OpenJDK and Eclipse OpenJ9: https://openjdk.java.net/ - RISC-V QEMU: https://www.qemu.org/
